title: Events
cleaned_text: Events In difficult times, we must work together to support each other. Join us online on Fridays at 2 pm ET for a A Mindfulness Experience. A monthly Sufi healing event for those affected by the COVID pandemic or any illness that is sponsored by the GW Center for Integrative Medicine. Find your centerpoint of peace on Wednesdays, 12:00 - 12:45 p.m. ET, with a guided meditation and community conversation. Gain gentle guidance into a meditation experience with master teachers from the McLean Meditation Institute in Santa Barbara, California.
